abstract: Parents of Antonio Zambrano-Montes, unarmed illegal immigrant from Mexico who was killed by police in Pasco, Wash, during confrontation, file suit against city.
lead_paragraph: The parents of a man shot dead after throwing rocks at police officers in Pasco have filed a claim seeking nearly $4.8 million from the city.

headline.main: Washington: Family Sues Over Immigrant’s Shooting
headline.print_headline: Washington: Family Sues Over Immigrant’s Shooting

snippet: The parents of a man shot dead after throwing rocks at police officers in Pasco have filed a claim seeking nearly $4.8 million from the city.
